title: Perform an Advisory Review
description: A business unit is planning a major new process and asks internal audit to perform an advisory review to identify potential risks upfront.

tasks.description: Meet with the project team to understand the goals and design of the new process.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor understands the proposed process.

tasks.description: Facilitate a risk assessment workshop to identify potential control gaps or weaknesses in the proposed design.
tasks.expected_outcome: The workshop identifies a potential lack of segregation of duties in the proposed workflow.

tasks.description: Provide a memo with recommendations for improving the control design before the process is implemented. (Note: In an advisory review, these are recommendations, not formal findings).
tasks.expected_outcome: The project team receives valuable input to build a more controlled process from the start.
